languages.text: "Ты забываешься, епископ — Император пожелал, чтобы Патент наследовался, и подписал свой указ кровью. Хочешь негодовать — делай это молча, но и в мыслях не смей оспаривать закон Его".

"You forget yourself, priest — it is the Emperor's decree, signed in His blood, that the Warrant of Trade be passed down through inheritance. If you are displeased, then do your brooding in silence, but let no thought of yours challenge His Law."
languages.original_text: "Ты забываешься, епископ — Император пожелал, чтобы Патент наследовался, и подписал свой указ кровью. Хочешь негодовать — делай это молча, но и в мыслях не смей оспаривать закон Его".

languages.text: “你太自以为是了，牧师。这是帝皇亲自签发的神圣贸易授状，上面印着祂的鲜血，代代相传。如果你对此有任何不满，那就安安静静地冥想吧，不要用你的思想挑战祂的律法。”
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, priest — it is the Emperor's decree, signed in His blood, that the Warrant of Trade be passed down through inheritance. If you are displeased, then do your brooding in silence, but let no thought of yours challenge His Law."

traits.locale_text: “你太自以为是了，牧师。这是帝皇亲自签发的神圣贸易授状，上面印着祂的鲜血，代代相传。如果你对此有任何不满，那就安安静静地冥想吧，不要用你的思想挑战祂的律法。”

languages.text: «No olvide su lugar, sacerdote. Es decreto del Emperador, firmado con Su sangre, que la Patente de Comercio sea hereditaria. Si eso no le gusta, quéjese para sus adentros, pero no permita que ningún pensamiento suyo desafíe Su Ley».
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, priest — it is the Emperor's decree, signed in His blood, that the Warrant of Trade be passed down through inheritance. If you are displeased, then do your brooding in silence, but let no thought of yours challenge His Law."

traits.locale_text: «No olvide su lugar, sacerdote. Es decreto del Emperador, firmado con Su sangre, que la Patente de Comercio sea hereditaria. Si eso no le gusta, quéjese para sus adentros, pero no permita que ningún pensamiento suyo desafíe Su Ley».

languages.text: « Vous vous oubliez, prêtre. Il s'agit d'un décret de l'Empereur, signé de Son sang. La lettre de marque se transmet par héritage. Si cela vous déplaît, je vous invite à ruminer en silence. Ne laissez plus vos pensées remettre en question Sa loi. »
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, priest — it is the Emperor's decree, signed in His blood, that the Warrant of Trade be passed down through inheritance. If you are displeased, then do your brooding in silence, but let no thought of yours challenge His Law."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous oubliez, prêtre. Il s'agit d'un décret de l'Empereur, signé de Son sang. La lettre de marque se transmet par héritage. Si cela vous déplaît, je vous invite à ruminer en silence. Ne laissez plus vos pensées remettre en question Sa loi. »

languages.text: 「司祭よ、身の程をわきまろ。通商令状が世襲によって受け継がれるのは、皇帝陛下ご自身の血によって署名された勅令によるものだ。不満があるなら黙って沈思するがよい。だが、そなたの思考の一片たりとも、皇帝陛下の法に逆らわせてはならない」
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, priest — it is the Emperor's decree, signed in His blood, that the Warrant of Trade be passed down through inheritance. If you are displeased, then do your brooding in silence, but let no thought of yours challenge His Law."

traits.locale_text: 「司祭よ、身の程をわきまろ。通商令状が世襲によって受け継がれるのは、皇帝陛下ご自身の血によって署名された勅令によるものだ。不満があるなら黙って沈思するがよい。だが、そなたの思考の一片たりとも、皇帝陛下の法に逆らわせてはならない」

languages.text: "Kendinizi şaşırmışsınız rahip. Ticari Ruhsatname'nin nesilden nesle aktarılması, İmparator'un kendi kanıyla imzaladığı hükmüdür. Memnun değilseniz bir köşede kendi kendinize karalar bağlayabilirsiniz fakat hiçbir düşünceniz O'nun Kanunlarına karşı gelemez."
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, priest — it is the Emperor's decree, signed in His blood, that the Warrant of Trade be passed down through inheritance. If you are displeased, then do your brooding in silence, but let no thought of yours challenge His Law."

traits.locale_text: "Kendinizi şaşırmışsınız rahip. Ticari Ruhsatname'nin nesilden nesile aktarılması, İmparator'un kendi kanıyla imzaladığı hükmüdür. Memnun değilseniz bir köşede kendi kendinize karalar bağlayabilirsiniz fakat hiçbir düşünceniz O'nun Kanunlarına karşı gelemez."

languages.text: "Ihr vergesst Euch, Priester – es ist der Erlass des Imperators, unterzeichnet mit Seinem Blut, dass der Handelsbrief durch Erbschaft weitergegeben wird. Falls Euch das nicht gefällt, brütet schweigend darüber, aber lasst keinen Eurer Gedanken Sein Gesetz anzweifeln."
languages.original_text: "You forget yourself, priest — it is the Emperor's decree, signed in His blood, that the Warrant of Trade be passed down through inheritance. If you are displeased, then do your brooding in silence, but let no thought of yours challenge His Law."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr vergesst Euch, Priester – es ist der Erlass des Imperators, unterzeichnet mit Seinem Blut, dass der Handelsbrief durch Erbschaft weitergegeben wird. Falls Euch das nicht gefällt, brütet schweigend darüber, aber lasst keinen Eurer Gedanken Sein Gesetz anzweifeln."
